glsa.title: PowerDNS Recursor: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in PowerDNS Recursor, the worst of which may allow execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: PowerDNS Recursor is a high-end, high-performance resolving name server

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in PowerDNS Recursor. Please review the CVE identifiers and PowerDNS blog post referenced below for details.

impact.p: A remote attacker may be able to send specially crafted packets, possibly resulting in arbitrary code execution or a Denial of Service condition. Furthermore, a remote attacker may be able to spoof DNS data.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All PowerDNS Recursor users should upgrade to the latest version:

references.uri: Related to recent DoS attacks: Recursor configuration file guidance
